Open source game creation software: No p: Softver za pravljenje open source igara: Programiranje ili kodiranje nije potrebno! Napravite HTML5 igre i igre za Windows, Linux (Ubuntu) i Mac OS X. Brzo napravite i podjelite svoju igru na mobitelu (Android i iOS) i na internetu.
GDevelop - Create games without programm: GDevelop - Napravite igre bez programiranja - Open source HTML5 i klasicni kreator igara
GDevelop is an <span class=\"foss\">open: GDevelop je open source, cross-platform kreator igara dizajniran da bude koristen od everyone - Znanje programiranja nije potrebno.
What makes GDevelop unique and so easy t: Šta čini GDevelop jedinstvenim i tako jednostavnim za korištenje su događaji. Događaji su moćan način da izrazite logiku vaše igre, bez potrebe za učenjem programskih jezika.
Events are composed of conditions, on th: Događanja se sastoje od stanja na lijevoj i akcija koje se pokreću kada su ispunjeni uvjeti
When Space is pressed, the character ani: Kada pritisnemo tipku Space, animacije karaktera i zvuk se pokrecu. Ako bomba dotakne karaktera, obadovoje su unisteni.
GDevelop flexible architecture allows yo: GDevelop fleksibilna arhitektura omogućuje odabir ako želite napraviti HTML5 igru koju možete igrati na internetu i prebaciti na Android ili izvorna igra za vaš operativni sustav. Ili aktivirati obje platforme i prebaciti vasu igru bilo gdje!
Create games for Android and iOS without: Napravite igre za Android i iOS bez znanja programiranja
Want to learn step-by-step how to use GD: Zelite nauciti korak po korak kako koristiti GDevelop, ili trebate pomoc o specificnom svojstvu? Wiki ima tutorijale za pocetnike i kompletnu dokumentaciju o softveru.
How to publish your game on Android or i: Kako objaviti tvoju igru na Android ili iOS
GDevelop features are provided thanks to: GDevelop features are provided thanks to extensions, allowing you to embed into your game just what you need. Here is a short list of what you get when using GD!
Tons of objects ready to be used: Mnogo objekata je spremno za koristenje
Draw your own shape on screen with the S: Nacrtajte vas orginalni oblik na ekranu sa Shape Painter
Make RPG-like maps with the Tiled map ob: Make RPG-like maps with the Tiled map objects
Quickly add behaviors to your objects: Quickly add behaviors to your objects
- Add a realistic behavior to your objec: - Add a realistic behavior to your objects
- create platformer games in a breeze: - create platformer games in a breeze
- quickly make your objects draggable wi: - quickly make your objects draggable with mouse/touch
And more, to automate current tasks and: And more, to automate current tasks and behaviors in a few clicks!
The scene editor let you visually edit y: The scene editor let you visually edit your levels
- Add interfaces and create parallax eff: - Add interfaces and create parallax effects
Create dynamically your levels with exte: Create dynamically your levels with external layouts
Save player data with HTML5 & native sto: Save player data with HTML5 & native storage
Full support for sounds effects and musi: Full support for sounds effects and musics
Build ambitious games with advanced feat: Build ambitious games with advanced features
Communicate with external websites using: Communicate with external websites using HTTP requests
Manipulate variables with arbitrary comp: Manipulate variables with arbitrary complex structures

GDevelop is open source (even <a href=\": GDevelop is open source (even this website): anyone can contribute and improve the software! Your games are also based on robust, free & open source technologies.
GDevelop is built from the ground to be: GDevelop is built from the ground to be translated into any language.
